meanings.sent1: The movie we watched last night was the unfunniest film I have ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's jokes fell flat, making his performance the unfunniest of the night.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, his unfunniest attempts at humor made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her unfunniest moments were like watching paint dry, utterly devoid of laughter.
meanings.sent5: The unfunniest party I attended had guests yawning instead of laughing.

meanings.sent1: The unfunniest cartoon character in the show never made anyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: His unfunniest remarks during the meeting were met with awkward silence.
meanings.sent3: She tried to be funny, but her unfunniest jokes only made people groan.
meanings.sent4: The unfunniest writer in the group struggled to make readers smile with his dull stories.
meanings.sent5: His unfunniest moments were like a dark cloud over the usually cheerful office.
